text: "He Would Be Sixteen" is a 1992 song by country singer Michelle Wright and is the third single from her third studio album Now and Then. It went to number 31 on the Billboard Hot Country Songs charts and number 3 on the Canadian RPM Country Tracks. It was nominated for a Juno Award in 1994. ==References== Category:1992 songs Category:Country songs Category:Michelle Wright songs
title: He Would Be Sixteen
